headline: JPMorgan Upgrades Cognizant Technology (CTSH) to Overweight, Lifts PT
summary: On May 19, JPMorgan upgraded Cognizant Technology Solutions Corporation (NASDAQ:CTSH) from Neutral to Overweight and raised the price target from $88 to $92. The upgrade comes after the company reported its fiscal first quarter results for 2025, where it beat market expectations. The company grew its revenue by 7.46% year-over-year to $5.12 billion, beating expectations […]
